s: ^Hello Mrs. Lee! I'm so excited I ran into you!
^Hello Mrs. Lee! I'm doing well now that I ran into you!
^Well, it's true. It's always great to talk with you.
^It's true ...in fact maybe you could help me with something?

Chat2: ^ so kind. My aerobic class make me feel energy! Really good for you! You try them."

s: ^Well, I actually want to ask some questions about your classes.
^That's great to hear! I  am looking for some information about classes.

Explain1: ^Mrslee?Smiling "I really enjoy these classes. What your question?"

s: ^Mr. Calindas's mother is moving to Bloomwood, and she needs great activities.
^Mr. Calindas's mother is moving here. Can we talk about aerobics class?

Explain2: ^Mrslee?Smiling "She move here? Live with Giancarlo? That is nice. Aerobic activity very good for mind and body."
^Mrslee?Smiling "I read that exercise fights depression. And dementia. Getting older is hard. Exercise help."

s: ^What do you suggest as a first step?

Suggestion1: ^Mrslee_Day 2_The Community Center offers a variety of classes that might suit Mother Calindas_Mrcalindas2-1

Suggestion1.#: notification Mrslee_Day 2_The Community Center offers a variety of classes that might suit Mother Calindas_Mrcalindas2-1

Suggestion1: ^Mrslee?Smiling "Well, they say she need to talk to doctor before starting new physical activity. I guess Giancarlo know that already."
^Mrslee?Smiling "Maybe Giancarlo can bring her here. We can help pick right class for her comfort. Swimming, aerobics, tai chi. The Community Center offer little of everything."

s: ^That sounds great! What about the social benefits?

Suggestion2: ^Mrslee_Day 2_Group exercise classes offer social physical, and mental benefits_Mrcalindas2-2

Suggestion2.#: notification Mrslee_Day 2_Group exercise classes offer social physical, and mental benefits_Mrcalindas2-2

Suggestion2: ^Mrslee?Smiling "Oh, yes! For elders, group exercise are very social. Lot of friend in my class."
^Mrslee?Smiling "When I lose Dr. Lee, Eddie feel stress. Worry that I would be all alone, and sad."
^Mrslee?Smiling "Exercise class give me many good things. So many friends. So many people to care. I see happy faces every day."
^Mrslee?Smiling "I stay fit, I have strength. It give me so much feeling of independence! It help me feel strong and my balance good. I love it!"
Goodbye: ^. Tell me when she here. I love to meet her. Now I go get ready to volunteer with Lila today. See you!"

s: ^Goodbye, Mrs. Lee. Have a wonderful day!
^Goodbye, Mrs. Lee, have a great time with Lila and the kiddos today!
